QuestData.Title: Iron Horde Invasion
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Varian Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Vindicator Maraad at the Shattered Beachhead in Blasted Lands.$B$BUse the portal at the Wizard's Sanctum in Stormwind to head directly to the front line.$b$bThis new threat is known only as the Iron Horde. They have taken over the Dark Portal and must be stopped.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vindicator Maraad at the Shattered Beachhead in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: The situation here is dire, $n. We have much to discuss.
